summary: The Billion Dollar Boondoggle Act of 2025 mandates an annual report on taxpayer-funded projects exceeding budgets or facing significant delays. The Director of the Office of Management and Budget will collect information from covered agencies, including descriptions, cost overruns, schedule delays, and contractor details for projects meeting specific criteria ($1 billion+ over budget or 5+ years delayed). This information will then be compiled into a report submitted to Congress and posted online.
